channel.title: 🏢 Wichita State University on NeurIPS 2024
channel.description: Recent content in 🏢 Wichita State University on NeurIPS 2024

item.title: Non-parametric classification via expand-and-sparsify representation
item.description: New non-parametric classifiers using expand-and-sparsify representation achieve minimax-optimal convergence, adapting to low-dimensional manifold structure.
